Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RemPlaybackState

Playback states.

Enumerator:
REM_PBS_STOP  Stop.
REM_PBS_PLAY  Play.
REM_PBS_PAUSE  Paused.
REM_PBS_OFF  The player is OFF.
REM_PBS_COUNT 

enum RemRepeatMode

Playback repeat modes.

Enumerator:
REM_REPEAT_MODE_NONE  No repeat.

REM_REPEAT_MODE_PLOB  Repeat the current plob.

REM_REPEAT_MODE_ALBUM  Repeat the current album.

REM_REPEAT_MODE_PL  Repeat the playlist.

enum RemShuffleMode

Playback shuffle modes.

Enumerator:
REM_SHUFFLE_MODE_OFF  Sequential play order.

REM_SHUFFLE_MODE_ON  Random play order.
